biocontainers.name: chromosight
biocontainers.summary: Detect loops (and other patterns) in hi-c contact maps.

biotools.summary: Chromosight is an algorithm inspired from computer vision that can detect patterns in Hi-C maps. Chromosight has greater sensitivity than existing methods, while being faster and applicable to any type of genomes, including bacteria, viruses, yeasts and mammals.
